sen.j: 間之町通（あいのまちどおり）は京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Aimanomachi-dori Street is a north-south running street in Kyoto City.
The Aimanomachi-dori Street is a street runningnorth-south through Kyoto City.
The Aimanomachi-dori Street is a street runningnorth-south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は丸太町通から南は七条通のやや南まで。
sen.e: It runs from the Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to an area slightly south of the Shichijo-dori Street in the south.
It runs from Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to an area slightly south of Shichijo-dori Street in the south.
It runs from Marutamachi-dori Street in the north to an area slightly south of Shichijo-dori Street in the south.

sen.j: 途中姉小路通と高辻通の間、および松原通と万寿寺通の間で分断されている。
sen.e: It is divided between the Aneyakoji-dori Street and the Takatsuji-dori Street and between the Matsubara-dori Street and the Manjuji-dori Street.
It is divided between Aneyakoji-dori Street and Takatsuji-dori Street and between Matsubara-dori Street and Manjuji-dori Street.
It is divided between Aneyakoji-dori Street and Takatsuji-dori Street and between Matsubara-dori Street and Manjuji-dori Street.

sen.j: 平安京には存在せず、豊臣秀吉による天正の地割で新設された通りである。
sen.e: It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning.
It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning policy.
It did not exist in Heiankyo and was built by Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI according to his Tensho zoning policy.

sen.j: 高倉通と東洞院通の「間」に作られたことがそのまま通りの名になった。
sen.e: This street was "between" the Takakura-dori Street and the Higashinotoin-dori Street, which became the origin of the name of the street.
This street was "between" Takakura-dori Street and Higashinotoin-dori Street, which became the origin for the name of the street.
This street was "between" Takakura-dori Street and Higashinotoin-dori Street, which became the origin for the name of the street.

sen.j: 一説では、真宗本廟門前に地割された新旧二つの門前町を東西に二分した通りであることから生まれた名称であるともいう（現在の五条通から七条通の間に相当する）。
sen.e: According to a theory, the name comes from the way the street (corresponding to the area between the current Gojo-dori Street and the Shichijo-dori Street) divided a district in front of the gate of Shinshu Honbyo--old and new areas partitioned by the zoning--into east and west sides.

According to a theory, the name comes from the way the street (corresponding to the area between the current Gojo-dori Street and the Shichijo-dori Street) divided a district in front of the gate of Shinshu Honbyo--old and new areas partitioned by the zoning--into east and west sides.

According to a theory, the name comes from the way the street (corresponding to the area between the current Gojo-dori Street and the Shichijo-dori Street) divided a district in front of the gate of Shinshu Honbyo - old and new areas partitioned by the zoning - into east and west sides.

sen.j: 姉小路通と高辻通の間では地割以前から町が十分に発達していたため、通りの新設は行なわれなかった。
sen.e: The new zoning did not Build any new streets in the area between the Aneyakoji-dori Street and the Takatsuji-dori Street, because it had been already urbanized.
No new streets were built in the area due to the zoning between Aneyakoji-dori Street and Takatsuji-dori Street, because it had been already urbanized.
No new streets were built in the area due to the zoning between Aneyakoji-dori Street and Takatsuji-dori Street, because it had been already urbanized.
